metadata.description: Git workflow plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: git-push
plugins.description: Interactive git push with manual commit messages - prompts for staging and commit message before pushing

plugins.name: git-push-agentic
plugins.description: Autonomous git workflow - Claude handles add, commit message generation, and push automatically

plugins.name: git-README
plugins.description: 5-agent README generator with smart merge - 4 parallel analyzers + review coordinator
